    • Get data

Get data

Source: vignettes/getdata.Rmd
getdata.Rmd
library(vndirect)
  • Get single timeseries
single_data <- getData('VCB', 100)
#> [1] "code:VCB"
head(single_data)
#>   code       date     time floor  type basicPrice ceilingPrice floorPrice open
#> 1  VCB 2023-10-11 14:41:28  HOSE STOCK       86.1         92.1       80.1 86.2
#> 2  VCB 2023-10-10 15:10:02  HOSE STOCK       84.6         90.5       78.7 84.6
#> 3  VCB 2023-10-09 15:10:02  HOSE STOCK       85.4         91.3       79.5 85.4
#> 4  VCB 2023-10-06 15:10:01  HOSE STOCK       84.5         90.4       78.6 84.5
#> 5  VCB 2023-10-05 15:10:01  HOSE STOCK       86.3         92.3       80.3 86.0
#> 6  VCB 2023-10-04 15:10:01  HOSE STOCK       86.3         92.3       80.3 86.3
#>   high  low close  average adOpen adHigh adLow adClose adAverage nmVolume
#> 1 86.5 85.7  86.3 86.03031   86.2   86.5  85.7    86.3  86.03031   686200
#> 2 86.2 84.6  86.1 85.92000   84.6   86.2  84.6    86.1  85.92000   734100
#> 3 85.4 84.0  84.6 84.31000   85.4   85.4  84.0    84.6  84.31000  1096100
#> 4 85.4 83.5  85.4 84.14000   84.5   85.4  83.5    85.4  84.14000   800900
#> 5 86.0 84.5  84.5 85.20000   86.0   86.0  84.5    84.5  85.20000   890000
#> 6 86.3 85.3  86.3 85.76000   86.3   86.3  85.3    86.3  85.76000   923800
#>       nmValue ptVolume     ptValue change adChange pctChange
#> 1 59034000000   9600.1 8.69118e+03    0.2      0.2    0.2323
#> 2 63074320000  68000.0 6.11240e+09    1.5      1.5    1.7730
#> 3 92412720000 116000.0 1.04128e+10   -0.8     -0.8   -0.9368
#> 4 67391540000      0.0 0.00000e+00    0.9      0.9    1.0651
#> 5 75829980000 124000.0 1.12925e+10   -1.8     -1.8   -2.0857
#> 6 79225170000      0.0 0.00000e+00    0.0      0.0    0.0000
  • Get multiple timeseries with default .size = 100 
multiple_stocks_data <- getData(c('TCB','VCB','BVB'))
#> [1] "code:TCB"
#> [1] "code:VCB"
#> [1] "code:BVB"
table(multiple_stocks_data$ticker_name)
#> < table of extent 0 >
  • Change default size
multiple_stocks_data <- getData(c('TCB','VCB','BVB'), .size = 500)
#> [1] "code:TCB"
#> [1] "code:VCB"
#> [1] "code:BVB"
table(multiple_stocks_data$ticker_name)
#> < table of extent 0 >
